decisions.description: This example decision node looks at the Contact that is calling and decides which Queue they should be routed to. Here, it checks both the name and country of the customer.
decisions.name: CustomerRoutingDecision
decisions.label: How should the customer be routed?

Flow.description: voice calls will route to fault, fault callback and VIP fault, VIP fault callback queues
Flow.label: Voice Calls Routed to Fault Queues

recordLookups.description: This example action is used to load the Contact who is calling, using the Phone Number from the Voice Call record. This contact can later be used to inform the decision on where to route the call.
recordLookups.name: GetContact
recordLookups.label: Get Contact by Phone Number

variables.description: The voice call record that is being inputted into the flow. Necessary for the flow to run.
